MOTS_092: First of all, and before using our systems/services, we invite you to read the terms and conditions of use.
MOTS_094: Once you want to play on our servers, you'll need to use an account specific to our system. To do that, start by registering:
MOTS_097: Once the registration is completed, make sure you have our Dofus client. If you don't have it yet, you need to install it on your computer for the upcoming steps to follow.
MOTS_120: Do you have a gift code?
MOTS_121: Then log in and enter it on this page. Once your code is validated, your gift will be automatically credited to your in-game account.
